docs.snippet: Bill Belichick’s funereal demeanor is rooted in the public imagination, but as one N.F.L. network analyst said, meetings with him can be illuminating, even fun....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bill Belichick’s funereal demeanor is rooted in the public imagination, but as one N.F.L. network analyst said, meetings with him can be illuminating, even fun.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column observes that network production crews have friendly impression of New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick, in contrast to his notoriously gloomy public image; notes that Belichick has been convivial and illuminating during closed-door meetings in which producers and directors are allowed to ask coaches private questions about direction of their teams.

headline.main: Behind the Scenes, Network Production Crews Find a Friendlier Belichick
headline.print_headline: Behind the Scenes, Network Production Crews Find a Friendlier Belichick

docs.snippet: The owners of the San Francisco 49ers football team have purchased a stake in Sacramento's minor league Republic soccer club, the second major team to do so this week in an effort to bolster the club's chances of winning major league status....
docs.lead_paragraph: The owners of the San Francisco 49ers football team have purchased a stake in Sacramento's minor league Republic soccer club, the second major team to do so this week in an effort to bolster the club's chances of winning major league status.

headline.main: San Francisco 49ers Buy Stake in Sacramento Soccer Team
headline.print_headline: San Francisco 49ers Buy Stake in Sacramento Soccer Team

docs.snippet: Perry, a pop superstar, will perform the halftime show at the Super Bowl, but she got her first taste of the sport with a memorable stint as a guest picker on ESPNs “College GameDay.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Perry, a pop superstar, will perform the halftime show at the Super Bowl, but she got her first taste of the sport with a memorable stint as a guest picker on ESPNs “College GameDay.”
docs.abstract: Pop star Katy Perry's performance at Super Bowl halftime show will crown her recent foray into world of sports; Perry recently had a very successful appearance as guest picker on ESPN's College GameDay during University of Mississippi's upset of Alabama.

headline.main: Katy Perry Touches Down in Football Fandom
headline.print_headline: A California Girl Travels to Arizona as a Fan
